entry.string: Add phpBB2 User to Xaraya Database on Login
entry.translation: Edd phpBB2 User tu Xereya Detebese-a oon Lugeen

entry.string: If a user has been authenticated by the phpBB2 but does not have a login account to Xaraya, the user will not be able to login. By selecting this option, a user that has been authenticated by the phpBB2 will be automatically added to the Xaraya database and allowed to login.
entry.translation: Iff a user hes beee oozeenteeceted by zee phpBB2 boot dues nut hefe-a a lugeen eccuoont tu Xereya, zee user veell nut be-a eble-a tu lugeen. Bork bork bork! By selecteeng thees oopshun, a user thet hes beee oozeenteeceted by zee phpBB2 veell be-a ootumeteecelly edded tu zee Xereya detebese-a und ellooed tu lugeen.
